CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Chalhoub Group's team,

I'm Jonathan. We specialize in boosting online store sales without monthly fee. Our success-based model means you only pay when we increase your revenue.

Recently, we helped a luxury goods & jewelry business grow their sales by 300% in just 3 months. They saw an additional $150K in revenue from our custom email campaigns.

Would you like to explore how we can achieve similar results for Chalhoub Group?

Let's schedule a brief call to chat about it.

Looking forward to connecting,

Jonathan Otani
Brand Development Specialist
Email On Performance

Please reply with "Not interested", if this seems irrelevant, thanks!
